game.name: Black Hole: Farmageddon
game.categories: Single-player, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 패닉에 빠진 동물들을 쫓으며 계속 성장하는 블랙홀을 키우세요. 잡고, 점진적인 업그레이드를 쌓고, “한 번만 더” 하고 싶어지는 빠른 플레이에 도전하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grow your ever-growing black hole as you chase panicked animals across levels with janky physics. Catch them, stack incremental upgrades, and dive into fast runs that always tempt ‘just one more’.
